description.full: Single Player, Xbox Live Multiplayer 1-4, 5.1 Surround Sound, HD (High Definition). You’re a Marine stationed on Mars when a military experiment goes wrong. Your mission - blast your way to freedom through the classic world of DOOM. Face off against Hell’s army including stampeding demons and undead Marines, and lay waste to rooms of monsters with the infamous BFG 9000 and an arsenal of classic weapons. Then, take the deathmatch online via Live and battle your friends for dominance of the leaderboards, or team-up with a friend in co-op. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: Experience the revolution of DOOM.  Originally released in 1993, DOOM introduced millions to the white-knuckle excitement of the first person shooter.  Relive the classic demon-blasting action, now, for the first time ever, with up to 4 players competing over Live, 4-player co-op over Live, 5.1 Surround Sound, enhanced graphics, and HD display support.
